p: 2-DE images were obtained for all three experimental groups ( Figure 1). The overall spot patterns within the group were similar. About 530 spots in the healthy pulp, 135 and 124 spots in each inflamed pulp gel, and 100 and 73 spots in each traumatic pulp gel were detected. Hundreds of spots were absent in the experimental group gels, compared with the healthy pulp gel ( Figure 2, red).
